name: css-shorthand-expander
description: Expand css shorthand properties into their longhand equivalents

scripts.start: mkdir -p src/grammars/generated/json && node ./node_modules/nearley/bin/nearleyc.js ./src/grammars/nearley/formalSyntax.ne > ./src/grammars/js/formalSyntax.js && node ./src/updateBasicDataUnits.js && node ./src/data/formatData.js && node ./src/formatFormalSyntaxes.js && node ./src/formatGrammars.js

author: mahirshah
